channel.title: CoD Bo2/mw3 Lag Comp
channel.description:
Any of you lot know any fixs for it for Xbox/PC(PC isn't a big deal)?
Sorry if this is the wrong section for it, feel free to let me know where I should ask to get this moved to if it requires to be moved.
On Bo2 it isn't a big deal since loads of people play it however on MW3 where the match making isn't as good I get lag comped a lot :x. I'd appreciate the help :D.

item.title: CoD Bo2/mw3 Lag Comp
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Click on public match and press X.

The port info is somewhere on live.com, under the help section for NAT issues, I’m doin hw right now, I’d look for it deeper if I had the time, but I’ve seen it before.

Read full topic

item.title: CoD Bo2/mw3 Lag Comp
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

It’s already set to open :(. When I press X nothing happens ;o. My lag is due to lag spikes cause my isp is shit but when it works properly 20 ping etc so I end up getting lag comped amotherfucker i can never win!

Any idea which ports they are?

Read full topic

item.title: CoD Bo2/mw3 Lag Comp
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Under the lobby selection menu, press X and make sure your search preferences are set to “Best”, then make sure your NAT type is “OPEN” to achieve the best possible connection available to you.

75% of the time, for me at least, the lag is due to a sucky host, you can avoid being “that guy” by assuring your NAT type is set to OPEN, and depending on your router, there are ports you can open to improve your NAT type/connection.

Read full topic
